A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan\, I enjoyed this movie. It did have a different feel in some ways. In other ways it truly captures the essence that is Star Wars. Star Wars was never about the big reveals or the famous people. It was about a farm boy staring off into twin suns wanting more. Wanting to be more\, to experience more and to live more. It is the essence of a little boy picking up a broomstick and pretending to BE Luke Skywalker. This movie made me FEEL the joy of Star Wars again.
